kpi.name: M5006C1

kpi_info.title: AVERAGE NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
kpi_info.use: The average number of available R99 Channel Elements. In Ultrasite EUBB WCDMA BTS a counter is the average amount of working baseband resources (HW capacity). In Flexi rel2 WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is not used; a counter is the average amount licensed capacity. In Flexi rel2 WCDMA BTS when baseband pooling is in use, a counter is the average amount of Local Cell Group dedicated baseband pool R99 CE capacity + total amount of R99 CEs in common baseband pool - R99CEs used by other Local Cell groups from common baseband pool at the counter sampling moment.

kpi.kpi_alias: AVERAGE NUMBER OF AVAILABLE R99 CHANNEL ELEMENTS
